Package org.ejbca.core.protocol.acme

Interface AcmeNonceDataSessionLocal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcmeNonceDataSessionBean
    public interface AcmeNonceDataSessionLocal
    Database implementation of ACME replay nonce storage.
    Version:
    $Id: AcmeNonceDataSessionBean.java 29072 2018-05-30 09:42:10Z bastianf $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void cleanUpExpired()
      Remove expired nonces from the database.
      boolean useNonce​(String nonce, long timeCreated, long timeExpires)
      Save a nonce to persistent storage.

    • Method Detail

      • useNonce

        boolean useNonce​(String nonce,
                 long timeCreated,
                 long timeExpires)
        Save a nonce to persistent storage. This will mark the nonce as "used" on all nodes in the cluster.
        Parameters:
        nonce - the replay nonce to store
        timeCreated - the time when the replay nonce was created
        timeExpires - the time when the replay nonce expires
        Returns:
        true if the given nonce has NOT been used before and has not expired, false if it has expired
        Throws:
        javax.ejb.EJBTransactionRolledbackException - if the nonce is already present in the database

      • cleanUpExpired

        void cleanUpExpired()
        Remove expired nonces from the database. Nonces that expired less than an hour ago are kept to account for clock drift.
